name: Mouse Tail (The Lame Brain)
description:
CONTROLS

  • Up/Right/Down/Left Arrow keys to move.
  • Space bar to pick up or drop objects.
  • Enter key to enter Mouse Holes, Arrow Passages, and Eat the Cheese.
  • S key toggles sound

I have enabled comments, please leave me feed back!

I mostly did the spritework myself, but I did use some patterns from clipart that I found on the internet for the most complex stuff. That work was unfortunately not credited, but if something here looks familiar, thank you!

Most of the sound is BFXR, but some of it (meows, the little bit of music at the end) came from OpenGameArt.com. Thank you "IgnasD" and "pauliuw"!

I also want to thank whoever did the Jerry Lawson Google Doodle. The second game in that collection heavily inspired me to make this.
